game.title: Safari Match
game.subtitle: Embark on a wild adventure through the African savanna in this addictive match-3 puzzle game!
game.description: Play Safari Match, a fun and addictive match-3 puzzle game set in the heart of the wild safari! Match colorful animal blocks, solve exciting puzzles, and unlock powerful boosters to win. Easy to play yet challenging to master, with hundreds of fun levels and stunning graphics. Perfect for kids and adults who love brain games, block puzzles, and animal-themed adventures. Play anywhere‚Äîmobile, tablet, or desktop‚Äîand become the safari master!

features.title: Wild Safari Theme
features.description: Immerse yourself in the beautiful African wilderness with stunning graphics and authentic safari atmosphere.

features.title: Hundreds of Levels
features.description: Challenge yourself with hundreds of increasingly difficult levels that will test your puzzle-solving skills.

features.title: Powerful Boosters
features.description: Unlock and use special boosters to clear obstacles and achieve higher scores.

features.title: Daily Challenges
features.description: Complete daily missions and compete with friends for the highest scores.

hero.title: Safari Match
hero.subtitle: Embark on a wild adventure through the African savanna in this addictive match-3 puzzle game!

sections.title: Basic Rules
rules: Match 3 or more identical animal blocks in a row or column
Create special combinations for powerful effects
Clear objectives to complete each level
Use boosters strategically to overcome obstacles

sections.title: Controls
rules: Mouse/Touch: Click or tap to select and swap blocks
Keyboard: Use arrow keys for navigation

sections.title: Tips & Tricks
rules: Look for potential matches before making moves
Plan your moves ahead to create combos

fieldDescription.title: Game Field & Elements
fieldDescription.subtitle: Discover the Safari World
fieldDescription.description: Each level presents a unique safari landscape filled with colorful animal blocks, obstacles, and special elements. Navigate through grasslands, forests, and waterholes as you solve puzzles and unlock new areas of the wilderness.

reviews.title: Reviews Safari
reviews.subtitle: What players say about Safari Match

items.name: LionHunter_2024
items.text: Amazing safari adventure! The animal blocks are so cute and the levels get really challenging. Been playing for weeks and still discovering new strategies!

items.name: ZebraMaster
items.text: Perfect game for relaxing after work! The safari theme is beautiful and the boosters are really powerful. Love the daily challenges!

items.name: ElephantQueen
items.text: My kids love this game! It's educational and fun. We play together and they're learning about safari animals while solving puzzles.

items.name: GiraffePro
items.text: Best match-3 game I've ever played! The graphics are stunning and the gameplay is addictive. Can't wait for more levels!

news.title: Safari Match News
news.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest developments, updates, and exciting stories from the wild safari world!

articles.title: Exciting New Features Released!
articles.excerpt: Discover the latest enhancements to Safari Match, including new animal blocks, special power-ups, and challenging levels that will test your puzzle-solving skills.

articles.title: 100+ New Levels Added!
articles.excerpt: We've expanded the safari adventure with over 100 new challenging levels. Navigate through dense forests, cross rivers, and explore new territories.

articles.title: Behind the Scenes: Creating the Safari World
articles.excerpt: Take a journey behind the scenes and discover how our team created the immersive safari environment. Learn about the inspiration, design process, and the challenges we faced.

articles.title: Community Spotlight: Player Stories
articles.excerpt: Meet some of our amazing players and hear their stories. From casual gamers to puzzle masters, discover how Safari Match has brought joy to players worldwide.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions, feedback, or want to share your safari adventure? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.description: We're here to help and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a question about the game, want to report a bug, or just want to share your experience, don't hesitate to reach out.

methods.value: 10 Downing Street, London, SW1A 2AA, United Kingdom

form.title: Send us a Message
form.successMessage: Thank you! We will contact you soon.

sections.title: Game Information
sections.content: Safari Match is a puzzle game developed and published by our team. The game is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We strive to provide an enjoyable gaming experience but cannot guarantee that the game will be free from errors, bugs, or interruptions.

sections.title: Age Restrictions
sections.content: Safari Match is designed to be suitable for players of all ages. However, we recommend parental guidance for children under 13 years of age. Parents and guardians are responsible for monitoring their children's use of the game and ensuring appropriate content consumption.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: When you use Safari Match, we may collect personal information, game data, device information, usage analytics, and technical data to provide and improve the gaming experience.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use collected information to provide and improve the game, personalize content, analyze performance, provide support, send updates, ensure security, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: What Are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help websites remember information about your visit, making your next visit easier and the site more useful.

sections.title: How We Use Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies for essential functionality, performance monitoring, user experience enhancement, analytics, and security purposes in Safari Match.

bar.message: We use cookies to enhance your gaming experience. By continuing to use this site, you agree to our use of cookies.
